bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫'
];
type = [
    '&area=2&sort=-1',
    '&area=2&sort=0',
    '&area=2&sort=1',
    '&area=2&sort=2',
    '&area=3&sort=-1',
    '&area=3&sort=0',
    '&area=3&sort=1',
    '&area=3&sort=2',
    '&area=4&sort=-1',
    '&area=4&sort=0',
    '&area=4&sort=1',
    '&area=4&sort=2',
    '&area=5&sort=-1',
    '&area=5&sort=0',
    '&area=5&sort=1',
    '&area=5&sort=2',
    '&area=6&sort=-1',
    '&area=6&sort=0',
    '&area=6&sort=1',
    '&area=6&sort=2',
    '&area=1&sort=-1',
    '&area=1&sort=0',
    '&area=1&sort=1',
    '&area=1&sort=2'
];
gender = [
    '-1',
    '1',
    '0',
    '2'
];
end = [
    '&end=0',
    '&end=2',
    '&end=1'
];
Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩国✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(5, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(10, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨国漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(15, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨台漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(20, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(25, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨未分类✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var list = java.getElements('.detail-main-info-value'); var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('data-original')); url = baseUrl; var a = java.getElements('.detail-main-info-author-field').text().includes('别名') ? 1 : 0; var b = java.getElements('.detail-main-info-author-field').text().includes('平台') ? 1 : 0; var c = java.getElements('.detail-main-info-author-field').text().includes('订阅数') ? 1 : 0; var authors = []; var authorElements = list[0+a].select('a'); for (var j in authorElements) { authors.push(String(authorElements[j].text())); } author = authors.join('/').replace(/[+、&]/g, '/').replace(/[.]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\&\//g, '').replace(/amp;/g, '').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/:\//g, ':'); s = '♥ ' + (c == 1 ? list[3+a+b].text() : '0'); k = list[3+a+b+c].text() + ',' + list[4+a+b+c].text() + ',' + list[1+a].text() + ',' + $2('.detail-main-info-class').replace(/.*?：/, '').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/连载中/, '').replace(/已完结/, ''); t = $2('.detail-list-title-3').replace(/更新/, ''); l = String(list[2].text()).replace(/(第\d+[话話章回期])\s+\1/g, '$1'); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🧭当前线路：〖' + (Get('p') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + (Get('p') == 0 ? '随机线路' : Get('p') == 4 ? '移动[' + Get('p') + ']' : '线路[' + Get('p') + ']')) + ('\n🎯取向分类：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + y[Get('o')]) + ('\n⏲️漫画进度：〖' + (Get('q') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + w[Get('q')]) + ('\n📰评论页数：〖' + (Get('f') == 5 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗前' + Get('f') + '页') + ('\n📝评论排序：〖' + (Get('r') == 1 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + z[Get('r')]) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; kind = s + ',' + String(k).replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,/g, ','); kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1'); var url1 = Get('url') + '/commentmore'; var id = url.match(/\/book\/(\d+)\/.*$/)[1]; var list1 = []; for (var c = 0; c < Get('f'); c++) { var page = c; var requestBody = `comment_id=0&chapter_id=&book_id=${id}&sort=${Get('r')}&page=${page}`; var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var option = { "method": "POST", "body": String(requestBody), "headers": headers }; var Url = url1 + ',' + JSON.stringify(option); result1 = java.ajax(Url); var pageList = JSON.parse(result1).list; list1 = list1.concat(pageList); } intro1 = $2('.detail-desc').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
').replace(/免费.*/, ''); var intro2 = ''; var intro3 = ''; for (var i = 0; i < list1.length; i++) { var intro2_1 = String('[' + list1[i].create_time + ']\n' + '〈' + list1[i].chapter_name + '〉').replace(/〈〉/, ''); var intro2_2 = '⛄ Lv' + list1[i].level + '【' + (list1[i].nick_name ? list1[i].nick_name : list1[i].username) + '】: '; var intro2_3 = list1[i].content; if (list1[i].reply_count !== 0) { var cid = list1[i].id; var requestBody = `comment_id=${cid}&sort=2`; var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var option = { "method": "POST", "body": String(requestBody), "headers": headers }; var Url = url1 + ',' + JSON.stringify(option); result2 = java.ajax(Url); var list2 = JSON.parse(result2).list; for (var j = 0; j < list2.length; j++) { var intro2_1_1 = '[' + list2[j].create_time + ']'; var intro2_2_1 = '⛄ Lv' + list2[j].level + '【' + (list2[j].nick_name ? list2[j].nick_name : list2[j].username) + '】: '; var intro2_3_1 = list2[j].content.replace(/(@\S+)\s{2}/, '$1：'); intro3 = intro3 +'\nㅤ ' + intro2_1_1 + '\nㅤ ' + intro2_2_1 + intro2_3_1; } } intro2 = intro2 + '\nㅤ\n' + intro2_1 + '\n' + intro2_2 + intro2_3 + intro3; intro3 = ''; } book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.detail-main-info-title'), 'author': author, 'kind': kind, 'word': '', 'latest': l.replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ').replace(/\s\d{4}\s\d{2}\s\d{2}$/, '') + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + intro1 + changeLog + '☕【评论】 评论数：' + $2('.commentcount.detail-selector-item-count') + intro2, 'cover': $3('.lazy'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { let response = java.ajax(urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl || !java.ajax(jsBaseUrl)) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { '
'; }

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('html.js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.manga-list-2 li');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.manga-list-2-title');
        intro = $('.manga-list-2-tip').replace(/免费.*/, '');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': '',
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover-img').attr('src'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover a').attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.manga-list-2 li')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.bookList:

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('html.js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.book-list li');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i in list) {
        name = $('.book-list-info-title');
        author = $('.book-list-info-bottom-item').replace(/[+、&]/g, '/').replace(/[.]/g, '').replace(/\|\//g, '').replace(/\&\//g, '').replace(/amp;/g, '').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/:\//g, ':');
        kind = $('.book-list-info-bottom-right-font');
        intro = $('.book-list-info-desc').replace(/免费.*/, '');
        cover = list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('src').includes('imagecover_s.png') ? list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('data-original') : list[i].select('.lazy.book-list-cover-img').attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind.replace(/已/g, ',').replace(/中/g, ','),
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.book-list-cover a').attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    var searchkey = java.get(Get('url') + "searchkey");
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.book-list li')).includes(String(list[0])) || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

    "headers": Headers

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.chapteritem ');
    date = String(java.getElements('.detail-list-title-3').text()).replace(/更新/, '');
    for (i in list) {
        title = String(list[i].text()).replace(/(第\d+[话話章回期])\s+\1/g, '$1');
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ').replace(/\s\d{4}\s\d{2}\s\d{2}$/, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/search?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&img_host=' + Get('p') + '&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
